data.name: Alignment of Naggaroth
data.description: Gain a 300 unique bonus to corporeal resistance. Gain a 169 unique bonus to elemental and spiritual resistance.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Remove up to 10 ailments, curses, or hexes from your groupmates within 100 feet. Restore 300 health for each health removed from the target.

data.name: Bathing In Blood
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will regain 30% of your health over 9 seconds. This effect cannot refresh.

data.name: Bleed Out
data.description: Attacks which generate Soul Essence will now generate an additional 10 points.

data.name: Blood Offering
data.description: For the next 5 seconds, you will regain 45 Soul Essence every second. If you run out of action points or break your concentration, this effect will end.

data.name: Bloodthirst
data.description: Covenant Of Celerity will now deal (20:150 + 0.20STR) spiritual damage.

data.name: Bound by Blood
data.description: Whenever you cast Khaine's Embrace, Transfer Essence, Unholy Reclamation, or Khaine's Fountain, you will be healed for X.

data.name: Chant of Pain
data.description: For the next 15 seconds, Transfer Essence will deal damage to up to 9 enemies within 30 feet sending the lifetap to all groupmates. In addition, it will apply Blood Heal on up to 9 allies within 30 feet.

data.name: Cheap Essence
data.description: Restore Essence now instant cast and costs 45 Soul Essence.

data.name: Cleave Soul
data.description: A potent attack which deals X physical damage to your enemy.

data.name: Consume Blessing
data.note:
Builds 30 Soul Essence
Target must have a blessing
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one blessing from your enemy and deals X physical damage.

data.name: Consume Strength
data.description: A crippling attack which deals X physical damage and causes your enemy to take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to strength for 20 seconds. Your defensive target gains a (3 * rank) ability bonus to strength.

data.name: Consume Thought
data.description: An overwhelming attack which deals X physical damage to your enemy and silences them for 4 seconds, making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Covenant of Celerity
data.description: For the next 60 minutes, all group mates within 100 feet of you gain a 20% chance to curse anyone that they damage, dealing X spiritual damage and reducing the victim's run speed by 20% for 9 seconds. You may only apply one covenant to the party, but players may be affected by multiple different covenants.

data.name: Covenant of Tenacity
data.description: A pact with Khaine that causes all groupmates within 100 feet to gain a (rank * 20) ability bonus to armor for the next 60 minutes. You may only apply one covenant to the party, but players may be affected by multiple different covenants.

data.name: Covenant of Vitality
data.description: For the next 60 minutes, all groupmates within 100 feet of you gain: Any time a groupmate damages an enemy, they have a 20% chance to deal an additional X spiritual damage to their victim healing for 100% of the damage done. You may only apply one covenant to the party, but players may be affected by multiple different covenants.

data.name: Curse of Khaine
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, all healing used on them for the next 5 seconds will become 50% less effective.

data.name: Dark Blessings
data.description: Direct heals cast on you will recover 10% more health.

data.name: Devour Essence
data.description:
You surround yourself or an ally with a devouring aura for up to 5 seconds. Each second, your ally will deal X spiritual damage to up to 4 enemies within 25 feet of them.

If you have a shield equipped, you will lose 25 Soul Essence per second and the target will be healed for 50% of all the damage dealt.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to willpower.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: Heal your target for (1200 + 0.8 WIL). This is not affected by healing debuffs.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 15 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage.

data.name: Efficient Patching
data.description: Patch Wounds will cleanse one ailment or hex from each groupmate within 100 feet when cast. It will not cleanse more than one effect per target.

data.name: Essence Lash
data.description: You lash out at up to 9 opponents in front of you up to 50 feet away, dealing X physical damage and regaining 15 Soul Essence for each enemy hit.

data.name: Expanded Transfer
data.description: Transfer Essence, Consume Thought, and Unholy Reclamation can now be used on targets within 30 feet.

data.name: Fell Sacrifice
data.description: When activated: deals X physical damage every second to up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of you and lose 45 Soul Essence. During this time you deal 30% more damage and gain a (9 * rank) morale bonus to weapon skill. This ability will end if you run out of Soul Essence to power it with.

data.name: Fist of Khaine
data.description: You call forth the wrath of Khaine, dealing X spiritual damage to your target.

data.name: Debuff
data.description: You flay your target for X physical damage, reducing their run speed by 30% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Rush
data.description: Gain 25% increased movement speed for 5 seconds. The duration is increased by 1 second for every 50 action points you had. You become exerted losing all of your action points, career mechanic points, and morale. Your AP recovery and morale per second are set to 0 for the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50% and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Fueled Actions
data.description: Whenever you are hit by an enemy, you have a 20% chance to gain 5 Soul Essence and another 40 over 4 seconds.

data.name: Gift of Khaine
data.description: Warding Strike now causes your victim to lose 50 action points.

data.name: Khaine's Blessing
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your autoattack speed is increased by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Khaine's Bounty
data.description:
You channel the power of Khaine through your body and into an ally healing them for X every second. You take X damage every second and cannot be healed for the duration.

If you have a shield equipped, you will gain 30% movement speed for the duration.

data.name: Khaine's Embrace
data.description: All of your groupmates within 100 feet of you regain X health.

data.name: Khaine's Fountain
data.description:
You throw yourself open to Khaine's influence as power rushes through you for up to 3 seconds. For 4 times, up to 9 allies within 30 feet of you will regain X health, and you will lose 20 Soul Essence. This effect will end if you lose your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence to power it with.

All snares are removed upon casting this ability, and you will be immune to them for the duration.

data.name: Khaine's Imbuement
data.description: Any time you hit an enemy, there is a 25% chance that they will suffer an additional X spiritual damage over 9 seconds. This effect cannot refresh.

data.name: Khaine's Invigoration
data.description: A quick heal that restores X (low) health.

data.name: Khaine's Refreshment
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet of you gradually regains X health over 10 seconds.

data.name: Khaine's Vigor
data.description: Khaine invigorates everyone in your group within 100 feet, granting them a (2 * rank) ability bonus to wounds for 1 hour.

data.name: Khaine's Withdrawal
data.description: Removes up to 6 ailments and hexes from each groupmate within 100 feet.

data.name: Lacerate
data.description: A gory strike that curses your enemy, dealing X physical damage initially and another Y physical damage over 10 seconds and causing the enemy to take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to toughness.

data.name: Life's End
data.description: Deal 225 + 0.3 STR spiritual damage to target. For the next 10 seconds, anytime you spend Soul Essence you will deal 225 + 0.3 STR spiritual damage to up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of you.

data.name: Murderous Intent
data.description:
Increases your chance to critically hit by 15% and your chance to parry by 10%, but you can no longer cast Khaine's Embrace or Stand Coward!

Patch Wounds will no longer dispel but instead will remove root and snares from you, making you immune to them for 10s. Increases the cooldown to 60 seconds.

data.name: Patch Wounds
data.note:
Requires 30 Soul Essence
Target must be hexed or ailing
data.description: You patch an ally's wound and remove one ailment or hex and grant them a (rank * 3) ability bonus to agility for 5 seconds.

data.name: Potent Covenant
data.description: Increases the chance for your Covenant of Vitality to trigger by an additional 15%. Adding or removing this tactic will dispel all covenants on your party.

data.name: Rend Soul
data.description:
You repeatedly assault an enemy, shredding their soul energy and twisting it to your own purposes. You strike the target up to 4 times over 3 seconds, dealing X spiritual damage per hit and consuming 15 Soul essence. Each hit heals your defensive target for 350% of the damage that was dealt.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence.

data.name: Restore Essence
data.description: Dark forces restore X health to an ally immediately, and another Y over 5 seconds.

data.name: Restored Motivation
data.description: Whenever you heal an ally, there is a 25% chance that they will regain 50 action points, but this effect will not work on you.

data.name: Sanguinary Extension
data.description: A slice aimed at fresh wounds which deals X physical damage. They are further cursed and take an additional Y physical damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Soul Infusion
data.description: Your target is gradually infused with X health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Soul Shielding
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet becomes surrounded by a magical barrier for 10 seconds, which will absorb up to X damage for each person.

data.name: Stand, Coward!
data.description: Life is restored to a dead ally, and 20% of their health is recovered in the hopes they will prove less worthless to you in the future. For the next 45 seconds, the target will be afflicted with Resurrection Illness.

data.name: Return Life
data.description: Resurrect your target to 1% health. This effect does not cause Resurrection Illness.

data.name: Terrifying Aura
data.description: Terrifying Vision will now affect enemies within 30 feet of the target.

data.name: Terrifying Vision
data.description: Your enemy is distracted by malevolent spirits, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage against you for 15 seconds. You will stop attacking when you use this ability, and the effect will fade if you attack someone that you have detaunted.

data.name: Thousand and One Dark Blessings
data.description: Groupmates within 100 feet gain (1020 + 4.2WIL) health over 15 seconds. You will gain 30 Soul Essence per second for the duration.

data.name: Transfer Essence
data.description: An unholy attack which deals X (str) physical damage healing your group for 100% of the damage dealt. Blood Heal will heal all groupmates within 100 feet for an additional Y (wil) health.

data.name: Transferred Focus
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your healing will be increased by 20% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Uncaring Dismissal
data.description: A great energy washes over up to 9 targets in front of you, blowing back all enemy players within 30 feet and knocking down monsters.

data.name: Unholy Reclamation
data.description: A strike at your target's soul which deals X physical damage. You are healed for 200% of damage dealt in addition to Blood Heal.

data.name: Universal Confusion
data.description: You stagger up to 9 enemies within 40 feet of you for 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged. You will gain X morale for each stagger that is broken early.

data.name: Vision of Torment
data.description: You are overcome with seemingly endless visions of you own grisly death if you should fail gaining 50 Soul Essence. So real are the visions, you generate 30 soul essence every second over the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Warding Strike
data.description: A cunning strike which deals X physical damage to your enemy and reduces their chance to parry by 10% for 15 seconds. You will gain 5% block for 15 seconds.

data.name: Replenishing Strikes
data.description: Whenever you critically hit an enemy, you will gain 40 action points. This effect can only happen once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Wracking Agony
data.description: A merciless attack which deals X physical damage to the target. This ability can only be used on targets below 40% health.
